title: [经济|娱乐][汉化]ShopChest —— 国外最火的商店插件[1.7-1.16.4]
author: EnTIv
txt_content:
本帖最后由 EnTIv 于 2021-1-2 07:17 编辑 

插件简介


      一款在 Spigot 论坛下载量最高,好评率最高的插件
      抛弃你的 QuickShop 和 ChestShop 来使用这款全新的插件吧                                                                                 

      十分易于使用,玩家买卖物品不需要使用命令
      只需要左键右键点击即可完成交易,创建商店也仅仅需要一个命令

      可以创建玩家商店和管理员商店
      完美满足系统商店和玩家自己创建商店的需求

      高兼容性,几乎支持所有的保护插件
      例如 WorldGuard，Towny，PlotSquared，LWC 等

      完善的保护机制,商店不受爆炸和漏斗影响
      没有旧版 QuickShop 悬浮物品刷东西的BUG

      高度可配置,配置文件和语言文件
      所有的选项和语言都能进行配置和汉化

使用帮助
      玩家创建商店:
      把想要出售的物品拿在手里,然后输入指令 /shop create 数量 购买价格 出售价格

      管理创建商店:
      把想要出售的物品拿在手里,然后输入指令 /shop create 数量 购买价格 出售价格 admin

      购买价格或出售价格设为 0 可以禁止购买或出售
      指令输入完毕后点击一下需要创建商店的箱子即可
      
插件权限　　
      shopchest.create: 允许玩家创建购买/出售所有物品的商店
      shopchest.create.buy: 允许玩家创建购买商店
      shopchest.create.sell: 允许玩家创建出售商店
      shopchest.create.admin: 允许玩家创建管理员商店
      shopchest.buy: 允许玩家从商店购买物品
      shopchest.sell: 允许玩家出售物品到商店

插件配置
[配置文件]config.yml
      # ===============================================
# ====== Configuration File of 'ShopChest' ======
# ===============================================
#
# Lines starting with '#' are comments and are ignored by the server.

# Set the main command you have to enter to manage the shops
# (default: "/shop ...")
main-command-name: "shop"

# Set the language of the item-, enchantment-, potion- and arrow-effect names
# The value must equal to the name of one of a file in the 'lang' folder
# (without the '.lang' extension)
language-file: "en_US"

# Set whether the floating shop items on top of the chest should be shown
show-shop-items: true

# Set the quality (speed) for hologram and item updating.
# Valid values are (from slowest to fastest):
# 'SLOWEST', 'SLOWER', 'SLOW', 'NORMAL', 'FAST', 'FASTER', 'FASTEST'
# The faster the value, the more performance will be used, which
# may lead to TPS loss.
update-quality: NORMAL

# Set the item with which a player can click a shop to retrieve information.
# You can set this to an empty string to disable this feature.
shop-info-item: "STICK"

# Set whether interaction with the hologram should be enabled.
# If set to true, a player can do the exact same thing with the
# hologram, as with the chest. You can even open the chest if you
# are the vendor or have permission.
enable-hologram-interaction: true

# Set whether a debug log file should be created.
# The file may get large! Please enable this setting when reporting bugs.
enable-debug-log: false

# Set whether WorldGuard integration should be enabled
# Of course, this only works if WorldGuard is installed
enable-worldguard-integration: true

# Set whether Towny integration should be enabled
# Of course, this only works if Towny is installed
enable-towny-integration: true

# Set whether AuthMe integration should be enabled
# Of course, this only works if AuthMe is installed
enable-authme-integration: true

# Set whether PlotSquared integration should be enabled
# Of course, this only works if PlotSquared is installed
enable-plotsquared-integration: true

# Set whether uSkyBlock integration should be enabled
# Of course, this only works if uSkyBlock is installed
enable-uskyblock-integration: true

# Set whether ASkyBlock integration should be enabled
# Of course, this only works if ASkyBlock is installed
enable-askyblock-integration: true

# Set whether IslandWorld integration should be enabled
# Of course, this only works if IslandWorld is installed
enable-islandworld-integration: true

# Set whether GriefPrevention integration should be enabled
# Of course, this only works if GriefPrevention is installed
enable-griefprevention-integration: true

# Set whether AreaShop integration should be enabled
# Of course, this only works if AreaShop and WorldGuard is installed
enable-areashop-integration: true

# Set whether the vendor of a shop should get messages when players
# buy or sell something from/to his shop or if his shop is out of stock
enable-vendor-messages: true

# Set whether only the shops a player has in sight should be shown to him.
# If set to false, every shop near the player (with the specified
# distance) will be shown to him.
only-show-shops-in-sight: true

# Set whether only the shop a player is looking at should be shown to him.
# This only has effect if 'only-show-shops-in-sight' is enabled
only-show-first-shop-in-sight: true

# Set whether the hologram's location should be fixed at the bottom,
# so when it gets more lines, it won't interfere with the item or chest,
# but goes higher.
hologram-fixed-bottom: true

# Set the amount (may be negative) a hologram should be lifted in the y-axis.
# A value of '1' equals to one block, and a value of '0.25' is equal to the
hologram-lift: 0

# Set whether players should be allowed to sell their items, even if the
# amount they have, is lower than the amount, the shop owner has set for the
# given price, or if the inventory of the chest doesn't have enough space
# for all the items, but only for a few, or if the player only has enough
# money for a few items, but not for the amount, the shop owner has set.
# When set to true, players may also buy items from a shop, even if the
# amount of items in the chest is lower than the amount, the shop owner has
# set for the given price, or if they don't have enough space in the
# inventory for all of the items, but only for a few, or if the shop owner
# doesn't have enough money to buy all of the items, the player wants to
# sell. The price will be calculated correspondingly.
# (If it's not clear enough, please let me know)
auto-calculate-item-amount: false

# Set whether prices may contain decimals (prices of existing shops will stay)
allow-decimals-in-price: true

# Set whether players should be allowed to sell/buy broken items
allow-broken-items: false

# Set whether the level of a potion or tipped arrow (if upgraded) should be
# appended to the item name. If set to true, the level ("II") will be
# displayed after the item name, but only if the item does NOT have a
# custom name. If set to false, it will only be shown in the
# shop info message.
append-potion-level-to-item-name: false

# Set whether shops should automatically be removed from the database if
# an error occurred while loading e.g. when no chest is found at a
# shop's location.
# This might be useful if you're removing shop chests with WorldEdit,
# resetting plots, or similar
remove-shop-on-error: false

# Set whether the mouse buttons should be inverted.
# Default:
# Right-Click -> Buy
# Left-Click -> Sell
invert-mouse-buttons: false

# Set the maximal distance (in blocks) to the shop where the
# player can see the hologram.
maximal-distance: 2

# Set the maximal distance (in blocks) to the shop where the
# player can see the floating shop item.
maximal-item-distance: 40

# Set the price a player has to pay in order to create...
# You can set this to 0 to disable costs.
# Value MUST be a number (e.g. 1, 1.5, 2.75, ...)
shop-creation-price:

  # ...a normal shop
  normal: 5

  # ...an admin shop
  admin: 0

# Set whether the shop's chest should be protected by hoppers
hopper-protection: true

# Set whether the shop's chest should be protected by explosions
explosion-protection: true

# Set whether the buy price must be greater than or equal sell price.
buy-greater-or-equal-sell: true

# Set the minimum prices for each individual Item. Not per Stack, per single Item!
# To add an item, follow the format below.
# Important: You must have exactly 2 leading spaces in each line
# You can find the item names in the 'item_names.txt' file.
minimum-prices:
# "STONE:1": 0.5
# "DIAMOND_SWORD": 100

# Set the maximum prices for each individual Item. Not per Stack, per single Item!
# To add an item, follow the format below.
# Important: You must have exactly 2 leading spaces in each line
# You can find the item names in the 'item_names.txt' file.
maximum-prices:
# "STONE:1": 19.9
# "DIAMOND_SWORD": 1000

# Set the items of which a player can't create a shop.
# To add an item, follow the format below.
# Important: You must have exactly 2 leading spaces in each line
# You can find the item names in the 'item_names.txt' file.
blacklist:
# - "STONE:1"
# - "DIAMOND_BLOCK"

# Set the events of AreaShop when shops on that region should be removed.
# Important: You must have exactly 2 leading spaces in each line
# Valid values are: DELETE, UNRENT, RESELL, SELL
areashop-remove-shops:
  - "DELETE"
  - "UNRENT"
  - "RESELL"
  - "SELL"

# Set whether the custom WorldGuard flags should be allowed by default
# (true = Allowed by default, false = Denied by default)
# This can, of course, be overridden in specific regions and is only
# enabled if WorldGuard is installed and WorldGuard integration is enabled
worldguard-default-flag-values:

  create-shop: false
  use-shop: false
  use-admin-shop: false

# Set the types of Towny plots where shop creation should be allowed for...
# Important: You must have exactly 4 leading spaces in each line
# Valid values are:
# RESIDENTIAL, COMMERCIAL, ARENA, EMBASSY, WILDS, SPLEEF, INN, JAIL, FARM
towny-shop-plots:

  residents:
    - "COMMERCIAL"

  mayor:
    - "COMMERCIAL"

  king:
    - "COMMERCIAL"

# Configuration of the database, where everything is stored.
# Shops are found in the table 'shop_list', and logged economy
# transactions are found in the table 'shop_log'
database:

  # Select the type of database which should be used
  # Either use 'SQLite' or 'MySQL'. Otherwise you will break the plugin!
  type: "SQLite"

  # If the specified type is 'MySQL', here you configure the...
  # (You can leave this empty if you're using SQLite)
  mysql:

    # ...interval in seconds, when the database should be pinged,
    # to keep the connection alive
    # You can set this to '0' to disable the ping interval
    ping-interval: 3600

    # ...hostname where the database is accessible
    hostname: ""

    # ...port where the database is accessible (default: 3306)
    port: 3306

    # ...database you want to use
    database: ""

    # ...username you are going to login with
    username: ""

    # ...password you are going to login with
    # Be careful, as anyone who can read this file, can read the password!
    password: ""

# Shop limits are handled with permissions.
# A player with permission "shopchest.limit.X" has a limit of X shops,
# a player with permission "shopchest.limit.*" does not have a shop limit.
shop-limits:

  # Set whether admin shops should be excluded of the shop limits.
  # If set to true, admin shops won't be added to a player's shop count.
  exclude-admin-shops: true

  # Set the amount of shops that anyone who doesn't have a
  # specific permission may have.
  # If you don't want the players to have a limit by default
  # set the value to -1.
  default: 5复制代码

[语言文件]zh_CN.yml
      # Set the message when a shop is created at the clicked chest.
# Usable Placeholders: %CREATION-PRICE%
message.shop-created=&7[&b快捷商店&7]&6你刚刚花费了 &c%CREATION-PRICE% &6创建了一个新商店

# Set the message when an admin shop is created at the clicked chest.
# Usable Placeholders: %CREATION-PRICE%

message.chest-blocked=&7[&b快捷商店&7]&c商店上面不可以有其它方块

# Set the message when a player tries to place a chest next to a shop's chest

message.double-chest-blocked=&7[&b快捷商店&7]&c商店上面不可以有其它方块

# Set the message when the clicked shop is removed.
message.shop-removed=&7[&b快捷商店&7]&6商店已删除

# Set the message when all shops of a player were removed.

message.all-shops-removed=&7[&b快捷商店&7]&6删除了玩家 &b%VENDOR% &6的所有商店 (&b&l%AMOUNT% 个&6)

# Set the message when the clicked chest is not a shop.
message.chest-no-shop=&7[&b快捷商店&7]&c这个箱子并不是商店

# Set the message when the player doesn't have enough money to create a shop
# Usable Placeholders: %CREATION-PRICE%
message.shop-create-not-enough-money=&7[&b快捷商店&7]&c你没有足够的金币，创建一个商店至少需要 &b&l%CREATION-PRICE%

# Set the vendor message the player gets after entering '/shop info'.
# Usable Placeholders: %VENDOR%
message.shopInfo.vendor=&7[&b快捷商店&7]&6卖家: &b%VENDOR%

# Set the product message the player gets after entering '/shop info'.
# Usable Placeholders: %AMOUNT%, %ITEMNAME%
message.shopInfo.product=&7[&b快捷商店&7]&6商品: &6%ITEMNAME% &6x%AMOUNT%

# Set the in-stock message the player after entering '/shop info'.
# Usable Placeholders=%STOCK%
message.shopInfo.stock=&7[&b快捷商店&7]&6库存: &b%STOCK%

# Usable Placeholders: %ENCHANTMENT%
message.shopInfo.enchantments=&7[&b快捷商店&7]&6附魔: &b%ENCHANTMENT%

# Set the potion effect message the player gets after entering '/shop info' if the product has a potion effect
# Usable Placeholders: %POTION-EFFECT%, %EXTENDED%
message.shopInfo.potion-effect=&7[&b快捷商店&7]&6药水效果: &b%POTION-EFFECT% %EXTENDED%

# Set the music disc title message the player gets after entering '/shop info' if the product is a music disc
# Usable Placeholders: %MUSIC-TITLE%
message.shopInfo.music-disc-title=&7[&b快捷商店&7]&6光盘编号: &b%MUSIC-TITLE%

# Set the generation message the player gets after entering '/shop info' if the product is a written book
# Usable Placeholders: %GENERATION%
message.shopInfo.book-generation=&7[&b快捷商店&7]&6Generation: &e%GENERATION%

# If the product is a tipped arrow but it doesn't have an effect, this gets displayed instead of the arrow effect
message.shopInfo.none=&7[&b快捷商店&7]&7无效果

# Set the price message the player gets after entering '/shop info'.
# Usable Placeholders: %BUY-PRICE%, %SELL-PRICE%
message.shopInfo.price=&7[&b快捷商店&7]&6购买:&b%BUY-PRICE% &6出售:&b%SELL-PRICE%

# If the sell price or buy price is disabled, this message will be displayed instead of the price in the message above.

# Set the type message the player gets after entering '/shop info' ...
# ... when the shop is normal.

message.shopInfo.is-admin=&7[&b快捷商店&7]&6类型: &b系统商店

message.buy-and-sell-disabled=&7[&b快捷商店&7]&c你不可以创建一个没有价格的商店

# Set the message when the player successfully bought something from an admin shop.

# Set the message when the player successfully sold something.

message.sell-success=&7[&b快捷商店&7]&a你以价格 &b%SELL-PRICE% &a出售了 &b%ITEMNAME% &6x%AMOUNT% &a给玩家 &b%VENDOR%

# Usable Placeholders: %AMOUNT%, %ITEMNAME%, %SELL-PRICE%
message.sell-success-admin=&7[&b快捷商店&7]&a你以价格 &b%SELL-PRICE% &a出售了 &b%ITEMNAME% &6x%AMOUNT%

# Set the message when a player bought something from the player's shop.
# Usable Placeholders: %AMOUNT%, %ITEMNAME%, %BUY-PRICE%, %PLAYER%
message.someone-bought=&7[&b快捷商店&7]&a玩家 &b%PLAYER% &a以价格 &b%BUY-PRICE% &a在你的商店购买了 &6%ITEMNAME% &6x%AMOUNT%

# Set the message when a player sold something to the player's shop.
# Usable Placeholders: %AMOUNT%, %ITEMNAME%, %SELL-PRICE%, %PLAYER%
message.someone-sold=&7[&b快捷商店&7]&a玩家 &b%PLAYER% &a以价格 &b%SELL-PRICE% &a出售给你的商店 &b%ITEMNAME% &6x%AMOUNT%

# Set the message when a player joins and made a revenue while he was offline.
# Usable Placeholders: %REVENUE%
message.revenue-while-offline=&7[&b快捷商店&7]&6你不在线的这段时间，你的商店一共收入 &b%REVENUE%

# Set the message when the inventory is full when the player is buying something.
message.not-enough-inventory-space=&7[&b快捷商店&7]&c你的背包里没有足够的空间

# Set the message when the shop's inventory is full when the player is selling something.
message.chest-not-enough-inventory-space=&7[&b快捷商店&7]&c商店已经满啦

# Set the message when the player doesn't have enough money to buy something.
message.not-enough-money=&7[&b快捷商店&7]&c你没有足够的金币

# Set the message when the player doesn't have enough items to sell.
message.not-enough-items=&7[&b快捷商店&7]&c你没有足够的物品

# Set the message when the vendor doesn't have enough money to buy something from the player
message.vendor-not-enough-money=&7[&b快捷商店&7]&c卖家没有那么多钱来收购了

# Set the message when the shop is out of stock.
message.out-of-stock=&7[&b快捷商店&7]&c商店库存不足

# Set the message the vendor gets when his shop is out of stock
# Usable Placeholders: %AMOUNT%, %ITEMNAME%
message.vendor-out-of-stock=&7[&b快捷商店&7]&c你出售物品 &b%ITEMNAME% &6x%AMOUNT% &c的商店缺货了

# Set the message when an error occurred.
# Usable Placeholders: %ERROR%
message.error-occurred=&7[&b快捷商店&7]&c发生了一个错误: %ERROR%

# Set the message when the arguments <AMOUNT>, <BUY-PRICE> and/or <SELL-PRICE> of '/shop create' are not a number.
message.amount-and-price-not-number=&7[&b快捷商店&7]&c价格和数量必需是数字

# Set the message when the argument <AMOUNT> is zero
message.amount-is-zero=&7[&b快捷商店&7]&c数量必需大于0

# Set the message when the config value "allow-decimals-in-prices" is set to false
# and a player enters a price with decimals
message.prices-contain-decimals=&7[&b快捷商店&7]&c价格不可带小数点

# Set the message when the player doesn't hold an item in the hand.
message.no-item-in-hand=&7[&b快捷商店&7]&c你手上没有物品

message.click-chest-to-create-shop=&7[&b快捷商店&7]&a请在 &b15 &a秒内右键你要创建商店的箱子

# Set the message when the player must click a shop to remove it.
message.click-chest-to-remove-shop=&7[&b快捷商店&7]&a请在 &b15 &a秒内右键你要删除的商店

# Set the message when the player must click a shop to retrieve information.
message.click-chest-for-info=&7[&b快捷商店&7]&a请在 &b15 &a秒内右键你要查看信息的商店

# Set the message when the player must click a shop to open it.
message.click-chest-to-open-shop=&7[&b快捷商店&7]&a请在 &b15 &a秒内右键你要打开的商店

# Set the message when the player opened a shop.
# Usable Placeholders: %VENDOR%
message.opened-shop=&7[&b快捷商店&7]&a你打开了 &b%VENDOR% &a的商店

# Set the message when the player tries to break a shop.
message.cannot-break-shop=&7[&b快捷商店&7]&c你不可以破坏商店

# Set the message when the player tries to sell a broken item.
message.cannot-sell-broken-item=&7[&b快捷商店&7]&c你不能出售坏掉的物品

# Set the message when the entered buy price is below the minimum price.
# Usable Placeholders: %MIN-PRICE%
message.buy-price-too-low=&7[&b快捷商店&7]&c购买价格必需高于 &b%MIN-PRICE%

# Set the message when the entered sell price is below the minimum price.
# Usable Placeholders: %MIN-PRICE%
message.sell-price-too-low=&7[&b快捷商店&7]&c出售价格必需高于 &b%MIN-PRICE%

# Set the message when the entered buy price is below the maximum price.
# Usable Placeholders: %MAX-PRICE%
message.buy-price-too-high=&7[&b快捷商店&7]&c购买价格必需低于 &b%MAX-PRICE%

# Set the message when the entered sell price is below the maximum price.
# Usable Placeholders: %MAX-PRICE%
message.sell-price-too-high=&7[&b快捷商店&7]&c出售价格必需低于 &b%MAX-PRICE%

# Set the message when buying is disabled at the shop.
message.buying-disabled=&7[&b快捷商店&7]&c这个商店仅出售商品

# Set the message when selling is disabled at the shop.
message.selling-disabled=&7[&b快捷商店&7]&c这个商店仅收购商品

# Set the message when reloading is done.
# Usable Placeholders: %AMOUNT% (Amount of shops)
message.reloaded-shops=&7[&b快捷商店&7]&a成功重载 &b%AMOUNT% &a个商店

# Set the message when the player's shop limit is reached.
# Usable Placeholders: %LIMIT%
message.shop-limit-reached=&7[&b快捷商店&7]&c你能创建的商店已达到限制 &b%LIMIT%

# Set the message that shows the player how many shop slots of his shop limit he has occupied.
# Usable Placeholders: %LIMIT%, %AMOUNT% (Amount of shops)
message.occupied-shop-slots=&7[&b快捷商店&7]&6你当前已创建的商店 &b%AMOUNT%&6/&b%LIMIT%

# Set the message when the player tries to create a shop with an item which is listed in the blacklist.
message.cannot-sell-item=&7[&b快捷商店&7]&c你不可以创建购买/出售这个商品的商店

# Set the message when the player tries to use a shop in creative mode.
message.use-in-creative=&7[&b快捷商店&7]&c你不可以在创造模式下使用商店

# Set the message when an update is available.
# Usable Placeholders: %VERSION%
message.update.update-available=&7[&b快捷商店&7]&6发现一个新的版本 &b%VERSION%

# Set the message you get when hovering over the available message.
message.update.click-to-download=&7[&b快捷商店&7]&6点击下载

# Set the message when no update is available.
message.update.no-update=&7[&b快捷商店&7]&6未找到可用更新

# Set the message when the update checker is started.
message.update.checking=&7[&b快捷商店&7]&6点击更新

# Set the message when an error occurs while checking for updates.
message.update.error=&7[&b快捷商店&7]&c检查更新时发生错误

# Set the message when a not permitted player tries to create a shop.
message.noPermission.create=&7[&b快捷商店&7]&c你没有权限创建商店

# Set the message when a not permitted player tries to create an admin shop.
message.noPermission.create-admin=&7[&b快捷商店&7]&c你没有权限创建系统商店

# Set the message when a not permitted player tries to create a shop on a protected chest.
message.noPermission.create-protected=&7[&b快捷商店&7]&c你没有权限在这里创建商店

# Set the message when a not permitted player tries to open another player's shop.
message.noPermission.open-others=&7[&b快捷商店&7]&c你没有权限打开这个商店

# Set the message when a not permitted player tries to buy something.
message.noPermission.buy=&7[&b快捷商店&7]&c你没有权限购买物品

# Set the message when a not permitted player tries to sell something.
message.noPermission.sell=&7[&b快捷商店&7]&c你没有权限出售物品

# Set the message when a player tries to buy something in a region/plot that denied shop use.
message.noPermission.buy-here=&7[&b快捷商店&7]&c你没有权限在这里购买物品

# Set the message when a player tries to sell something in a region/plot region that denied shop use.
message.noPermission.sell-here=&7[&b快捷商店&7]&c你没有权限在这里出售物品

# Set the message when a not permitted player tries to remove another player's shop.
message.noPermission.remove-others=&7[&b快捷商店&7]&c你没有权限删除这个商店

# Set the message when a not permitted player tries to remove an admin shop.
message.noPermission.remove-admin=&7[&b快捷商店&7]&c你没有权限删除系统商店

# Set the message when a not permitted player tries to reload the shops.
message.noPermission.reload=&7[&b快捷商店&7]&c你没有权限重载商店

# Set the message when a not permitted player tries to check for updates.
message.noPermission.update=&7[&b快捷商店&7]&c你没有权限检查更新

# Set the message when a not permitted player tries to change configuration values.
message.noPermission.config=&7[&b快捷商店&7]&c你没有权限改变配置

# Set the message when a not permitted player tries to extend another player's shop's chest.
message.noPermission.extend-others=&7[&b快捷商店&7]&c你没有权限放置大商店

# Set the message when a not permitted player tries to extend a chest into a protected region/plot (e.g. WorldGuard/Towny).
message.noPermission.extend-protected=&7[&b快捷商店&7]&c你没有权限在这里放置商店

# Set the header of the help message the player gets after entering '/shop' or an invalid command.
# Usable Placeholders: %COMMAND%
message.commandDescription.header=&7[&b快捷商店&7]&6箱子商店帮助

# Set the footer of the help message the player gets after entering '/shop' or an invalid command.
# Usable Placeholders: %COMMAND%
message.commandDescription.footer=&7[&b快捷商店&7]&6已显示所有命令

# Set the command description message for '/shop create' when you type '/shop'.
# Usable Placeholders: %COMMAND%
message.commandDescription.create=&a/%COMMAND% create <数量> <购买价格> <出售价格> &7- &6创建商店

# Set the command description message for '/shop create' when you type '/shop' and have permission "shopchest.create.admin"
# Usable Placeholders: %COMMAND%
message.commandDescription.create-admin=&a/%COMMAND% create <数量> <购买价格> <出售价格> [normal|admin] &7- &6创建系统商店

# Set the command description message for '/shop remove' when you type '/shop'.
# Usable Placeholders: %COMMAND%
message.commandDescription.remove=&a/%COMMAND% remove &7- &6删除商店

# Set the command description message for '/shop info' when you type '/shop'.
# Usable Placeholders: %COMMAND%
message.commandDescription.info=&a/%COMMAND% info &7- &6查看商店信息

# Set the command description message for '/shop removeall' when you type '/shop'.
# Usable Placeholders: %COMMAND%
message.commandDescription.removeall=&a/%COMMAND% removeall &7- &6清除某个玩家的所有商店

# Set the command description message for '/shop reload' when you type '/shop'.
# Usable Placeholders: %COMMAND%
message.commandDescription.reload=&a/%COMMAND% reload &7- &6重载插件

# Set the command description message for '/shop update' when you type '/shop'.
# Usable Placeholders: %COMMAND%
message.commandDescription.update=&a/%COMMAND% update &7- &6检查更新

# Set the command description message for '/shop limits' when you type '/shop'.
# Usable Placeholders: %COMMAND%
message.commandDescription.limits=&a/%COMMAND% limits &7- &6查询已创建的商店

# Set the command description message for '/shop open' when you type '/shop'.
# Usable Placeholders: %COMMAND%
message.commandDescription.open=&a/%COMMAND% open &7- &6打开商店

# Set the command description message for '/shop config' when you type '/shop'.
# Usable Placeholders: %COMMAND%
message.commandDescription.config=&a/%COMMAND% config <set|add|remove> <property> <value> &7- &6改变配置文件的值

# Set the message a player gets after setting a configuration value per command
# Usable Placeholders: %PROPERTY%, %VALUE%
message.config.set=&7[&b快捷商店&7]&6已设置 &b%PROPERTY% &6的值为 &b%VALUE%

# Set the message a player gets after adding a value to a list in the configuration per command
# Usable Placeholders: %PROPERTY%, %VALUE%
message.config.added=&7[&b快捷商店&7]&6添加值 &b%VALUE% &6到 &b%PROPERTY%

# Set the message a player gets after removing a value from a list in the configuration per command
# Usable Placeholders: %PROPERTY%, %VALUE%
message.config.removed=&7[&b快捷商店&7]&6清除 &b%PROPERTY% &6的值 %VALUE%
